title: Pyun Pyun Maru
synopsis: The Ninja Pyun Pyun-Maru and his brother Chibi-Maru are working at an office that accepts anything. They solve unexpected happenings caused by other Ninjas.
staff: [['Yamaguchi, Yasuo', ['Episode Director']], ['Tsunoda, Jirou', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Original Creator']], ['Noda, Takuo', ['Key Animation']]]
